name: Jun J
text: Delicious vegan pizza and salad! We got the Berkeley Vegan and a California salad with balsamic. The customer service was great throughout the day as we had to coordinate the delivery around unseasonal snow flurries. I never thought I'd see the day where I could get a dank af vegan pizza delivered to my door. Thanks y'all!

name: Kathryn Stryker
text: Glad they have a vegan option. I ordered pickup and they forgot my add on of olives. I noticed before I drove off and went back in to ask for them. Check your pizza! Nice people, just need a little more attention to detail.

name: Garrett Koep
text:
Two medium pizzas were ready in 15 minutes (call ahead).

name: Maytal Abramson
text: Might be a good place to bring a group of kids, but if you want good pizza, there are better options in Reno. Pizza is okay, the crust is good but the service can be a bit slow. I would not recommend the salads or the vegan pizza. For vegans, just order no cheese!

name: Bonkerz !
text: 1st time trying Zpizza and I regret not trying them sooner, it was an incredible experience! Got the Berkeley Vegan and it's officially the best pizza I've had in Reno. The crust is fire baked to perfection with quality ingredients topping it. Definitely recommendingüå±‚ù§

name: Coco Long
text: Vegan pizza was great but not a place to get a salad. Very skimpy on the toppings on the salad.

name: Shaun Ballard
text: I love zpizza even though they removed a favorite sandwich of mine. The pizza selection is unique and awesome. Everyone here is friendly and accommodating. Pricing is fair, but can get expensive quick.

name: Alan Ruiz
text: Awesome place. Pizza is delicious and guys up front rock. Only vegan pizza I can get that looks like pizza.

name: Rachel Rueth
text: Z Pizza offers a delicious variety of pizzas -  no one should be disappointed. In addition to the many options of combinations on the menu, they also offer build your own, and typically have several choices of single slices to choose from. ‚Ä¶More

name: Rodney Wiedemer
text: Good customer service but they only had one person behind the counter so it took a bit longer than expected for the food. Good food though as well.

name: Jules Krimm
text: The staff is friendly and the crust is awesome.  Everyone at our table, including my four-year-old, was happy!
